messages.subject: worries about reading?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/17/2005 2:17:05 PM Mountain Daylight Time, rinnyboo@yahoo.com writes: I am  afraid that I will get caught up in the fact that my son isn t
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/17/2005 2:17:05 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
rinnyboo@... writes:

I
am afraid that I will get caught up in the fact that my son isn't
reading or doing math yet.


-------------

The new issue of Live Free, Learn Free is probably worth buying if you have
ANY reading worries. (And not just because there's a new article from me
that's never appeared anywhere else, and one by Anne Ohman, and lots of stuff on
reading.)

_http://www.livefreelearnfree.com/current.htm_
(http://www.livefreelearnfree.com/current.htm)


Sandra





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
